name: Phạm An Hào
label: Web Developer
summary: I learned Web Development at FPT Aptech Saigon. I am interested in Math, software development, Vim, Unix and Chinese Characters.

work_experience.company: BenTre High School for Gifted Students
Can Tho University of Medicine and Pharmacy
work_experience.summary: Back in high school, my only concern was to pass the exams with good grades and follow the goal set by my parents of becoming a doctor. During the COVID-19 lockdown time, I suddenly had more time at home and began to ask myself if I really want to pursue this career for the next 6-8 years. In the end, after much contemplation and consulting with my family, classmates and teachers, I decided to take my leave of absence from school at the end of the 2nd year.
This was a courageous endeavour that didn’t have a title. It was quite important to my overall development though so I’m adding it to my CV. Also it explains the gap in my CV.
highlights: I also stumbled upon the FOSS community and developed a deep appreciation for it. Today, I use Neovim to write both my LaTeX math notes and other notes that use the markdown syntax. For my front-end projects though, I still use the vim emulation extension in VSCode.
Refresh my memory about Math since it was my most favourite subject in High School even though my major was biology. I discovered LaTeX which is used to write beautiful math notations.

Learned Chinese characters. It is worth mentioning that I do not specifically learn Chinese Mandarin. Learning Chinese characters gives me a deeper appreciation regarding the East Asian culture sphere as well as open many opportunities in the future.

work_experience.summary: I decided to take learning web development seriously. During my two years at FPT Aptech, I found myself in a very nice environment, compared to self-study at home, with enthusiast lecturers and friendly classmates. They had taught me a lot and also gave me the motivation to keep following this path.

projects.title: Trello UI clone with ReactJS
projects.summary: Implementing beautiful layout and the Drag-drop feature for task boards and the cards inside them.
highlights: ReactJS and Material UI for the layout
Light and Dark mode base on system preference
DND kit for Drag-drop boards & cards
ESLint, Yarn, Node Version Manager, Vite
Logical project structure that are easy to read and maintain

images.caption: Drag and Drop with placeholder and beautiful animation

skills.skills: HTML5, CSS3(SASS), JavaScript, ReactJS, Material UI, TailwindCSS, Redux
Linux, Git, Github, bash, vim motions, Vite, Tmux
